website_summaries.verdict: With the SoundSport Wireless, Bose delivers the thunderous bass and the comfortable design you want in gym-focused earphones, but they're not cheap.
pros: Powerful audio performance with intense bass response and crisp highs
cons: Slightly expensive for what you get

customer_reviews.title: Cool earphones, sounds great.  Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I considered buying the other big brand but since my last pair got beat up so soon I thought I'd go with a traditional speaker brand. Sound quality is excellent, what I'd expect from bose. Cost a lot. Durability: I'm a bit worried it would break as I'm not extremely delicate. Presentation: amazing. Really well presented in a massive box for a tiny little thing. I reckon I can store biscuits in that box now, recycling is good. Comes with a little round pouch and some extra ear plugs for size. Charged quickly, lasted long. Pretty comfortable too. Would I buy it again? Probably, but it does cost a lot so I'll try not to break these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, especially for iPhone users
customer_reviews.text: I researched extensively for a decent set of wireless headphones to use at the gym and when commuting to work. These really are the best out there, the Bluetooth connection is rock solid both indoors and outside, and the sound quality is good, particularly when paired with an iPhone. The only down side is that they don't have any noise isolation so you can hear what is going around you in noisy environments, but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Benjamin R Leach

customer_reviews.title: Zero noise cancellation - would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these IMMEDIATELY. Awful for gym or using on public transport. They let in so much ambient sound! I had them on full volume and I could hear everyone’s conversations around me. I don’t even know about the sound quality or durability, was too distracted by the rest of the noise around me so had to switch to my old earphones within an hour of having these on.
customer_reviews.author: Flemeny cricket

customer_reviews.title: Total junk
customer_reviews.text: Had two pairs, the first pair mysteriously broke 8 days out of warranty after only very occasional use. Bought a replacement pair and got nothing but connectivity problems to multiple devices. The wireless component of them is more bother that it's worth, you will find yourself constantly in BT settings reconnecting/rebooting devices. It's a shame because the sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal headphones. Bought to use while out running and for use round the house. Highest sound quality I’ve had; on full volume nothing is too loud, but the range and depth of sounds is amazing. Beep bass tones and higher frequencies sing and bony sound harsh or ‘tinny’. Excellent for running. One you get the right fitting in your ear they stay in place and you don’t even notice they are they’re. Battery life is a little on the low side of using continually. But as they’re designed for short term wear (workouts etc) then it can be forgiven. A quick 10/15minute charge and you’re good to go for another hour.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew1579

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have been an audiophile for decades. I have good hearing and my normal phones are Senn IE8 or Grados. Reading the reviews, I was suspicious that some reviewers were evaluating knock-offs. Guess what, there is a website that indicates there are multiple knockoffs of these Bose units. Anyway, it is early days but the connection to iWatch and iPhone was flawless and the retention and comfort is very good. Sound quality is rich and warm, lacking a little detail but perfectly good for sports and active use. Battery life and durability are initial assessments but may change with use.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for the two months that they work. Both my original and replacement pair have worked for around 2 months then ceased to charge. It’s a common fault, google the product name and won’t charge and the info appears. The sound quality is very good and battery life decent but both pairs have lasted around two months before they no longer charge.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jones

customer_reviews.title: No sounds insulation at all
customer_reviews.text: First review I've ever written and solely doing so because of how disappointing these earphones have been. They do not sit 'in ear' and therefore have almost no buffer from outside noise. Whilst cycling, the sound of the wind is far too loud and annoying. In the gym (with Gym music being played on the speakers) you need to have your volume at maximum as there's almost zero noise cancellation. The only positives with these earphones is the sound quality. I'm more keen on replacing them than I was expecting them. Massive let down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 18 days - Not up to Bose standards: AVOID
customer_reviews.text: Headphones had great sound quality... However the headphones broke just 18 days after purchase. They started beeping and then died. I tried charging them at different ports, different plugs, etc but they were still dead. I would not expect this from most speaker/headphone manufacturers but especially not Bose. These earphones cost me £114 and for that kind of price I would expect these to last years. I have gone back to my wired headphones which have lasted me well over 6 years now! Amazon were great and provided me with a full refund and extended return policy so no fault on their side.
customer_reviews.author: chaky-t

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Splashed out on these after some terrible cheap ones, and we'll worth it. Negative points: a little chunky perhaps, and not very loud when connected to my phone, though that may be due to volume limitations elsewhere. Would love a charging case to be included (available separately). Good points: the range of sound is great, good response from bass and treble, and very, very clear. The buds are super comfortable, and you get 3 sizes to choose from shipped in the box. Battery life seems good, though a year or two of testing will tell. They stay put when I'm running and aren't moved by sweaty skin. Overall, great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: B. Meecham

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound from a tiny package.
customer_reviews.text: They look great with the grey/lime colouring. Easy and comfy to wear, they’re very light and you forget they’re even in your ears. The battery lasts about 6/7 hours for me so will do most of a day working from home. Sound quality is really amazing for something this size. The bass is incredible, clear and thumpy but delivered with crisp treble and a decent mid range. I would say the sound quality is as good as if not even a little better than my ‘proper’ headphones which are sennheiser and cost over £300. I’ve just about stopped wearing them unless I really need noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Jezzerh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've been putting off getting wireless earphones for ages and recently updating my phone ment I had to now. Couldn't be happier, the wire connecting the buds makes me feel better knowing I can't really lose one (without losing them completely obvs), the sound quality is just as good as the wired bose sound sport I've been using up until now and it holds its charge well and charges quickly. The only negative I would give is that it doesn't come with a charge case, that has to be bought separately.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband. He has been through several pairs of cheaper wireless headphones, he likes to watch tv on his phone during his commute and complained of poor lip sync with cheaper versions. I hesitated on spending this amount on them, but decided to treat him as he has a decent commute! So delighted I did! Thankfully the Bose name stood up to its reputation, he is raving about their superior sound quality and flawless lip sync!
customer_reviews.author: Aisling

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great. Older versions were so much better
customer_reviews.text: Used to have the wired version which were awesome. Unfortunately these are only average in their design. Bose have taken a step backwards... The tip that goes into your ear is not as comfy and becomes uncomfortable after a while of wearing When worn during running / cycling the wind noise is horrendous - I’ve never heard anything like it and at times you can’t even hear the music over the wind noise The cable gets caught in coats / clothing. Not comfortable to wear I wouldn’t buy again. Shame as the old wired ones didn’t have any of these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only Lasted Three Weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Date of manufacture was January 2019 and I bought them in December 2019. They would not charge up after owning them for less than a month. Had to send them back to Bose. It does not help that they have been sat on a shelf for the best part of a year before they are sold on to a customer like myself. Fortunately, Bose were able to send me a new pair as they are covered by a two year manufactures warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew hunt

customer_reviews.title: Sound amazing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some headphones for when Im at the gym, running and doing stuff in the garden as one of my AirPods nearly fell out and landed in a can of fence paint! Also, suitable for when its raining. I've only used these a few times but they sound amazing, feel comfortable and look cool. Just what I expect from Bose. I bought the charging case too which is a nice little addition. Excellent. I love them. I also bought my girlfriend the Bose Pulse version and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa h

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earbuds
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of wireless earbuds I’ve ever used but as I already have a pair of wired Bose earphones which I love, so I took the plunge and bought these and I’m so pleased I did. Good quality, as you’d expect and reasonable battery life, excellent fit and a good price. Most importantly though is the sound, it’s great with just the right of bass (for me). I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Madda54

customer_reviews.title: They fit ok and the quality of sound is satisfying ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit ok and the quality of sound is satisfying but they are awefuly quiet...I keep them on max volume all the time which is just enough in the quiet room but out on the road cycling or running the volume is really disappointing :(
customer_reviews.author: P. N. Walczynski

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with good Bluetooth Range
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones as I needed a more active variation that offers me flexibility away from my phone. These headphones are a great product, used them a few times so far and the bluetooth range is very good (Can go around the house without my phone and it remains clear with no cut outs (Going outside to the opposite side of a brick wall cuts out here and there but still maintains connectivity) I thought the earpieces would be too heavy for my ears and they'd just fall out, but keeping active they stayed in with no problems. I recommend these for gym enthusiasts, runners and just general usage.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Awful flimsy clip, Headphones good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in October. Used twice and the clip has basically unsprung. I can't get it to clip together so I am clipless. The 'phones are secure in the ear but to my mind, it's hand when they're dangling. I contacted Amazon, not interested as it's out of the return period(bought mid October 18) so they advise return to Bose but think as it doesn't affect the functionality then they probably won't care either. So, £114, no clip, 2 months old. The phones themselves are good but make your own mind up as to the quality of the clip and whether or not if it broke, it would concern you. It does concern me hence the rating.
customer_reviews.author: T. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Superb for music, Terrible for making phone calls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for 2 reasons; Listening to music and using as a bluetooth device to connect to my iPhone. Listening to music these earphones are excellent 5 stars Using for phone calls these are so bad I am strongly thinking of returning them. The problem is that the microphone is so ultra sensitive that it picks up every sound within a massive radius making it very difficult for the person you are speaking to hear what you are saying, to the extent I have had to disconnect these when using the phone. Hence 0 star for the microphone/speech use. Definitely not what I would expect from any product of this price or from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Coolio

customer_reviews.title: Good but not wow
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is wow and really really good. However they are let down by the following points. 1. Bluetooth connection hit and miss 2. Power button is a pain to push on and off. Requires firm press. 3. Mic for talking is really good 4. The cable is a hinderence and went for the jabra wire free headsets which blow these away for the same price. Overall well built however let down due to the points above
customer_reviews.author: Jay Cee

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sound the same to my £20 sonys. Not very comfortable. Alot of soundleak even though the sound isnt very loud on these. I'm using the one plus 7t pro and this phone give you more sound then you could ever want or need but still wasn't enough with these earphones. Had to really put power into the power button, very mushy. No way this is worth the price. Connection is fast and good though especially for earphones from 2016. not at all comfortable but they do stay in the ear even when in bed. Really wanted to love these but got disappointed. Got a no hassle refund so thats great.
customer_reviews.author: Halid Aman

customer_reviews.title: Good but lacking in small details.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound expected of Bose. The design however is slightly clumpy, not sure they need to stick out as much as they do. There are three sizes of rubber bits so should fit all ears. My gripe is the little details, other Bose products have the Bose TM on the USBs, these however are just plain USBs, also a plug isn't provided for the USB charging cable, which for the price is a bit irksome.
customer_reviews.author: daniel1991

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, full bass and clear midrange and treble. These come in a great little carry case with D ring pluse three sizes of ear buds. Once you get used to "screwing" them in they are very solid and unlikely to fall out. The battery life after 4 vhours is around 80% but I rarely let them get much lower. I mainly use these when moving around in London. They let a little background noise is which is just what you want to keep safe and aware when crossing roads etc. I would only use noise cancelling only in safe static environments.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Morley

customer_reviews.title: Great sound don't stay in ears
customer_reviews.text: the sound is much better than a rival brand I tried (dre beats) and so far they actually continue to work unlike that brand although I am unsure as to how the bose headphones can be described as sports headphones if you more than breathe in theses they fall out and if they become moist there's no chance at all of them being any use. battery life is not as good as it's rival and is quite annoying if you try to use these on a more continuous basis than for a couple hours at the gym, attempting to get an 8 hour day out of them at work is a bit of a push.
customer_reviews.author: Arran

customer_reviews.title: Big with wind noise.
customer_reviews.text: It's like a beta product that should have been left on the engineer's bench. I'm comparing to a pair of fully wired in-ear Bose earpods, and these are meant to be newer. They're a joke. To get any volume out, it's so loud that people around me can easily identify songs. They stick out. They're big. And annoyingly, my window to return them closed yesterday. I'm upset.
customer_reviews.author: Hamster

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for about 5 months on planes, gym and other leisurely activities and have to say couldn't be happier with them. The sound quality is very good as expected with any Bose product. They are comfortable on the ears when at the gym or not. The battery life could be better but that's a common problem with all devices these days. I still get about 4 hours or so on one full charge. The little carry case for the earphones is very handy and compact for storage.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.R.C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've recently tried Sony earbuds (returned as unhappy) and a cheap no-brand (kept as can't complain for the price) before returning to Bose ... and I have not been disappointed that I did ! I've had a number of Bose products, and these match previous good experience of their headphones. Summary: - Happy with the audio quality (some allowance as small & Bluetooth) - Easy to pair. - Comfortable fit in the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: really good comfy earphones
customer_reviews.text: i use these for work. good balance and not heavy o uncomfortable to wear. sound quality is really good and the app which you can add to your music device is really good. i can sit my iPod on my desk and walk around the office wearing and listening to music without it cutting out so real good bluetooth connection. would recommend these for anyone unsure. i do not like in ear earphones as i find them really uncomfy these were great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible headphones + customer support
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 40-50 days, then started developing annoying 'errors' and bugs, nothing major, just some audio quality loss, not turning on, turning themselves off, not pairing etc.. then another 10-15 days later stopped working entirely, wont charge, wont paid, wont turn off, the battery will drain and when you charge they may work for a few minutes but quickly stop again. Bose refused to help other than a 4-8 weeks replacement process, as they weren't purchased from a bose retailer. Terrible. Ive spent the same money again on a new pair from a different brand and wont be buying Bose again, which sucks as they were one of my favourite brands for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buttons stopped working
customer_reviews.text: These were great to begin with. I had to buy smaller buds as even the smallest ones were too big for me, but the replacements made them perfect. But after 5 months of use the buttons stopped working. I can switch the headphones on, but have to sync to my phone every time afresh and from then on the buttons do not react - I cannot turn them off, turn the volume up or down or skip songs. Gutted as these are not cheap. Do mot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: great reccomendation
customer_reviews.text: Bought on recommendations from my team at work - perfect for work/conference calls and also for personal/gym use. Huge improvement from Apple Headphones (with iPhone) that I was using whilst i shopped around; was keen to buy something I could test out first. Roughly 12 people on my Team use these and speak very highly of them.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlindl85

customer_reviews.title: Podcast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I find the use of these great nudge to getting me out the door for my daily walks. Although they do not cut out the noise completely it is still so much better than the earbuds that came with my phone. There are two issues, my right ear bud fits perfectly the left one is not as comfortable. Second issue the charging of the buds feels delicate because of the flap that has to moved to insert charger.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing really rich open sound with quality base Down point is the ear buds are very poor don’t really fit in your ear well so background noise is an issue the wire needs to be a bit longer too They do sound fantastic though and because of the fact they don’t go in the ear far volume is an issue too had to crank it all the way up full on my iPhone in the gym
customer_reviews.author: Darrenob1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ear phones!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit straight from the box, so didn’t need to fit different sized ear buds. Battery life is good at about 5 -6 hours on a charge. Used for cycling and general walks, didn’t want full noise cancelling ear phones as you need to be able to hear traffic etc when cycling/ walking on footpaths. Sound quality is excellent, plenty of Bass and little noise leakage to outside, so you won’t irritate anybody nearby with your music. Can get a little sweaty after a long ride but no worse than any other earbuds I have used. When answering the phone , using the earbuds , people cannot tell you are using the earbuds to talk and listen , brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: DTbad

customer_reviews.title: Sound is excellent but design not so
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fantastic and totally blocks out sounds around you (great at the noisy gym!) but the earbuds tend to drop out easily when I run because I sweat a lot and need to wipe my face often. The towel invariable knocks out one of of the earphones. I had before earphones that had a grip that could be bent behind your ear and that was much better. So, the sound is 10/10 but the design I would say 7/10.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Lots of connection issues.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sounds quality is great they feel nice in your ears. Nice design and ease of use. Cons: connection issues after a week or so with my pixel 2xl. Literally couldn't get them to work for like 10 minutes each time I tried to use them. Charger cable not connecting properly to the point I had to return them. They need to incorporate a charging dock system like the Google buds rather than a wire as it leads to issues.
customer_reviews.author: tommy gun

customer_reviews.title: Earbud Size and design need to be revisited
customer_reviews.text: I loved the audio quality of base and the navigation was perfect to initiate the device .. however Bose need to seriously redesign the Ear bud size for women or people with small ears and the hooking mechanism isn’t strong enough .. I sadly had to return because they kept coming out and that was just going to a supermarket walking and coffee shop at this price one expects a more improved design to fit all. ..
customer_reviews.author: JADE JEDI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Comfy. Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as the BOSE stayhear+ tips have always fitted me perfectly. The wing-type tips are very comfortable indeed as they stay put regardless of activity and don't feel too sweaty. Very solid sound depending on source. With my S8 phone I just add a little bass on the EQ settings and they sound great with everything. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this product but was disappointed and returned them. I have small ears and these did not fit in my ear at all, they were quite big. For the amount of money I spent, I expected the sound to be amazing, I thought it would be noise cancelling and bassy, but no, it was average - the sound quality was exactly the same as the free headphones that came with my iPhone. A shame!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but disappointing for sports
customer_reviews.text: The sound is pretty good (at least as good as my previous cheaper Leophile bud-in-ear headphones) but even after fitting the correct size ear-pieces, if I do more than walk with them (ie jog), the earpieces don't stay in very well because all the weight in the earpieces, unlike the Leophiles where the weight sensibly rests in the neck piece. Not really a sports design IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: robh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality and range
customer_reviews.text: Bought these Bluetooth wireless SoundSport earphones after having 2 faulty SoundSport wired earphones. Such is my faith in Bose products: I own about half a dozen different systems, including in my car. These Bluetooth wireless earphones are very easy to pair up with my iPhone. The sound quality is far superior to the wired Bose SoundSport earphones. It must be mentioned that Amazon were very helpful in resolving my faulty earphones (not these ones) and gave me a refund. Which meant I could upgrade to these ones. Very happy with the bass sound. Quality is very clear too.
customer_reviews.author: Jpa

customer_reviews.title: Just not durable enough
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these headphones they haven't lasted well, I'd like to think I'm a careful user, I always have them stored in the carry case provided. However I noticed the seal of the outer casing coming loose near the power button. Recently the whole seal has started to come loose, meaning i am scared to use them in any form of moisture (what they're designed to be used for). I will provide pictures when able to. Other than this the Headphones sound good, my brother has the Beats X which sound just as good if not better, but these are still great sounding. Battery life can be temperamental but overall they do as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: equaliser and tips
customer_reviews.text: quite uncomfortable but i am persevering, the cable connecting the buds looks kind of daft but seems a good idea. play around with the equaliser which is set to flat by default. Have now purchased a pair of Bose StayHear Ultra tips as suggested by another reviewer on here and it has improved things a lot in terms of both comfort and sound quality, but why should i have to upgrade the tips at all on a £100 item?
customer_reviews.author: Keith F.

customer_reviews.title: Second pair I got to exchange due to not just battery but cosmetic issues
customer_reviews.text: I thought Bose would provide a great earphone... untill less than a year of use and the first pais was coming undone and I had to replace it and the second I got less than a six months and the battery works like hell and has tons of glitches. I will get them replaced, again but I wouldn't buy this brand of earphones again but try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando G. Yache

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but they didn't even last 2 years :(
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these, I was really happy with them. The sound quality was great! I purchased them in Dec 2016 and there now totally stopped working. The buttons and rubber around them has completely dismantled. Every disappointed and not the quality you would expect from Bose. It's a lot of money to pay for something that doesn't even last 2 years!!
customer_reviews.author: Soraya

customer_reviews.title: Not great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these earphones a while ago and whilst the quality and fitting of them is good, I find the battery life quite poor and the sound just doesn't go loud enough for my liking - or have a deep enough bass. I've had similar quality soundplay off cheaper earphones that cost less than half the money. Good product but not worth the price in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: S. Hampson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound, but I don't really get 6hrs of music, more like 4. Otherwise great product
customer_reviews.author: Chin Yi Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying sports headphones for many years and some of which are regarded as a good reliable brand. I've always loved Bose products but never thought to buy a pair for the gym due to the cost. Typically I do a lot of cross fit and as anyone knows it's a hardcore workout of which many headphones don't last 5 minutes, these on the other hand are amazing. The sound quality is crystal clear and drowns out a lot of background noise, as gyms can be very noisy. They are durable and absolutely stay in place and do not fall out. Can't recommend this product enough you won't a better pair of headphones especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D P St.Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Another Bose product let be down.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is not too bad, I have an issue with them staying in my ears and I’ve tried different pads but the biggest problem is the connection keep dropping out on whatever device I try. I love Bose the brand but these are just another Bose product that has let me down. I thought at £114.99 these were going to be perfect but sadly not.
customer_reviews.author: AudiDoodi

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundSport
customer_reviews.text: For starters, I've always been a big fan of Bose products. We have a 5.1 surround sound system in the house, I have noise cancelling headphones I use for travel, etc. I was given these as a Christmas gift in 2017. The product worked flawlessly for about a year. Evidently there is a 1-year warranty on the product, and of course just before Christmas 2018 the product started having issues. It won't hold a charge, will shut down suddenly, etc. For a Bose product, especially given the cost, I would expect much more.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: These are very light and comfortable to wear. They fit securely in the ear and could never fall out. They have superb sound quality throughout the frequency range. I would certainly recommend them. I didn't want complete noise cancellation for safety reasons, but they do cut out a good percentage of sound from the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. William Hynd

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I've not used them for intensive exercise so can't comment on their sweat proof-ness but as far as sound and comfort they are amazing. 🎉 I can wear them all day at work and during the commute to and from, with a recharge mid day, and barely notice I'm wearing them. They do stick out a little bit that hasn't bothered me. And people assume you work in which ever shop they see you wearing them in so perhaps you could have a little fun with that. 🤭 I would highly recommend. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Danny Rendle

customer_reviews.title: The sound on these is amazing and the Bluetooth connection distance is pretty impressive
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these is amazing and the Bluetooth connection distance is pretty impressive. I like the fact that the earphones tell you how much battery life is left. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: L Band

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: When they say you pay for quality - it is so true with these. I love my hi-fi equipment - and these fit into the line up perfectly. They fit into my ears snuggly. Great for gym workouts or outside running.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Thought

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve had, only very minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got several other wireless headphones trying g to find a perfect pair for me (used for daily use and cycling). They are very impressive. I was worried about the lack of sound isolation but has caused me no issues. I also worried they would not stay in - again no issue even after getting caught out by a heavy downpour on a cycle. I also like they don’t use the volume button for skipping tracks which can be frustrating on some. Overall very happy and don’t be put off by the lack of noise isolation and concerns of them staying put
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for runners
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely brilliant. Excellent for running, great sound quality. Don’t leave in your shorts when you run a wash though as they are not washing machine proof and they you need to buy them again. Doh.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, poor Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: As you’d expect from Bose, sound is excellent. Quite happy with them overall, but the Bluetooth connectivity is the worst I’ve used. Whilst running, all I have to do is turn my head (phone in back pocket) so the right hand ear is facing forward and it struggles. Basically anything at all gets in the way then the music starts to break up. Frustrating to say the least considering the price. I’ve used £15 earphones that were better than this.
customer_reviews.author: julian connell

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish glitchy awkward product.
customer_reviews.text: No one should purchase these earphones. Despite the decent sound quality and good in ear stability, this product is massively let down but its constant need to up date horribly glitchy firmware. Want to head out for a run, remembered to charge your earphones, only to find when you pick them up that they wont turn on, or won't connect. Check the community boards on Bose websites. Loads of people having these and other issues. No help from Bose either. Steer clear of Bose sound sport.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Hill.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, secure, sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Bought primarily for running, in the hope they'd be more secure than other, cheaper in-ears. They haven't disappointed. You effectively screw these things into your ears, and they're not going anywhere after that! Sound quality is excellent (a little heavy on the low end, but that's what you want for running). I can't comment on battery life as I recharge most nights, but reviews pegged them at app. 6 hours. The device reports its current battery life after being switched on, and that seems about right; great for exercise, not so good for flying across the Atlantic. Overall very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: wedge@siliconheaven.co.uk

customer_reviews.title: They don’t quite stay in when running
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and sound quality is as you’d expect from Bose. However, the earbuds don’t quite stay in when running. I had to buy a set of noise cancelling replacement buds as the standard sports buds just don’t stay in. Walking around etc is fine but running and HIIT are problematic
customer_reviews.author: P. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had various makes of headphones but these are by far the best I’ve ever bought, had 2 different types of Dre beats and thought they were good until I bought Bose they are crystal clear and all you hear is what is playing and no outside interference would absolutely recommend go buy and enjoy
customer_reviews.author: christine1

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible little buds! Every single earphones would fall off my ears. Those little buds stayed exactly where I put them for the whole 90inutes workout, including 30min run. On top of that looks and sounds amazing! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: missnike

customer_reviews.title: Best earphones
customer_reviews.text: One of the best bluetooth earphone in the market. I have bought this thrice now as i lost the previous one. This is one of the 2 earphones in the market with oval ear tip, which is very important for my ears, the round tips hurt when i wear for long. And the bonus is awesome music. I’m a huge fan of these ear phones.
customer_reviews.author: Soumya

customer_reviews.title: Overrated sound quality, not good for gym use
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of these. Bought to replace jaybird x3's, that failed just after a year. Mostly for gym use. Sound was ok, but nothing special, felt comfortable, but i was always very aware of their presence. Very poor sound isolation, regardless of tip size, so unusable at my gym where there is background music. Returned, got shure se215's instead.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M.

customer_reviews.title: Useless (unless you’re indoors)
customer_reviews.text: These are useless outdoors (Unless you want to damage your hearing with max volume) - when I say outdoors I mean everything but a sound insulated room, the minimum noise like a car on a quiet road or just a train announcement will make the music (or whatever you’re playing) disappear... I’m not expecting noise cancelling btw, my out-of-the-box iPhone headphones were better. I bought this for commuting in the mornings, it was the completely wrong choice
customer_reviews.author: fcl

customer_reviews.title: Use Daily
customer_reviews.text: Use them daily to replace their wired companions. Battery lif is about 6 hours so I can push out about 2 days of commuting on them, all though you soon get used to dropping them on charge. Great on an aircraft, no noise cancelling but they block out the majority of the aircraft noise passively. Sound quality is as good as the wired variant, however when making a call I end up having to remove one ear as you loose side-channel (can’t hear yourself clearly). That’s the only bad thing I can think of to say about them...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for over a year, sound quality still as good as new
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for prolonged hours during workout and runs for the past year and a bit. Good battery backup, I have used for 6-8 hours on and off and battery comes down to 10% and requests for a charge ( it basically mumbles that in your ear). The cables and sound quality is still as good as it was when new. Different size ear nodules provided will suit ear lobes of any size, in fact it’s a perfect fit for me after being so finicky about other headphones not fitting right. It’s not completely noise cancelling, which is what I prefer when running outdoors etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment over tacky alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Had these around 9 months now. I can't be in the gym without them. Most expensive ones I've ever had but worth the outlay. Always used the cheap argos sports ones or similar but I never knew any different. Would never go back now. Great product. Sound is great, they stay in your ear and charge last long and charges quick anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why bother with anything else?
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable earphones, best i've found to date that don't look too bulky and don't come out when running. Personally, I don't have any issues with the sound. The bass is nice, not too overbearing, with nice clarity. Lost the clip already though, comes off way too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Croz

customer_reviews.title: A Bucket List Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery life and a deep rounded sound that delivers the music that you want effortlessly ..... if they are within your budget then you certainly won’t regret the expense
customer_reviews.author: William I. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Great but not 100% weather proof.
customer_reviews.text: My second set in 3 years, not entirely weather proof. Great sound, back clip broke -rubbish, but overall a great set of headphones supposedly "wireless" but has a wire connecting ear to ear. Disappointing my trustee set of 3 years didn't survive a autumn shower and the left ear and in line functions stopped working fully.
customer_reviews.author: Miss N. D. Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Sound OK but poor fit.
customer_reviews.text: Sound ok no better than normal ear buds, pairs well, easy to adjust volume , pause and next track. Fitting not good for me. Despite 3 different sized ear buds none fit tightly for me and with the weight to the outside of the ear they are both lose and uncomfortable. Will be trying an after market product that may help them fit better. Need to use a headband over my ears to make sure they won’t fall out.
customer_reviews.author: N. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are good and I like them a lot, however, They’re not perfect. They do drop out of my ears when running which can be annoying and the sound quality is good but imo could be louder. Battery life is good and you get a verbal update on what % you have left. I bought these to replace some cheaper Anker ones that stopped working when running in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: john Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in the gym, and have found them to be excellent. The clip that you can clip to your shirt is great and keeps the wire stable. The sound quality is brilliant, as I have always found with Bose. They are very comfortable; albeit the ear tips can be a bit stiff at first, but after a while they soften up and are extremely comfortable. I have even found myself wearing them at work every now and then. Would recommend, especially for the current price.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and customer service
customer_reviews.text: This headphones offer excellent quality at a very affordable price. They also look good. I bought a pair of these headphones and had a problem with them after a few months. I contacted the seller who offered a replacement straight away. I received the new pair in a question of days. The lady at the customer service, Elsa, was extremely helpful. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BPM

customer_reviews.title: ... but for everyday wear and office conf calls i love
customer_reviews.text: absolute quality i dont use these for sport only occasion as I prefer the beats but for everyday wear and office conf calls i love these
customer_reviews.author: jagtar khatkar

customer_reviews.title: Sound is superb / deep with great bass
customer_reviews.text: You pay for what you get in this life - I’ve tried cheaper alternatives and I have to say these blow them away. Great sound quality, beautiful bass and easy to set up...they work well with Apple Music and I use them most days. At the moment build quality too early to report on but will review again after I’ve run more with them....
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Biking and lifting with these is great!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic piece of kit. I have owned beats and bose earbuds before... I got these for christmas to upgrade from my soundsport wired. The sound quality and battery life is fantastic. Being wireless - biking and lifting weights is all round a better experience! I have the charging case to leave in my gym bag for on the fly charges too.
customer_reviews.author: woo

customer_reviews.title: Great little headphones, but battery and noise cancelling could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones that have awesome sound quality. Two slight drawbacks. Firstly they aren’t noise cancelling at all. I don’t mind that as I don’t want to be completely shut off from the world whilst running around a busy city, but I can see why some would want a better experience in that respect. The battery also isn’t great - I’m getting around 5 hours in between charges which is less than stated. Only benefit is when you turn them on they give you a battery percentage straight away which is useful.
customer_reviews.author: storez101

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and sweat resistance
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, as expected from Bose. They fit well in the ears and don’t fall out even during the most sweaty workouts!!
customer_reviews.author: MissG

customer_reviews.title: Decent set of headphones for use during exercise 👍.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these since 2016 and they have only just failed. They failed during a gym session, I'm guessing my sweat finally made its way in! I have made good use of them, during this time, for running, rowing, weight training and travelling on planes. They always stay in my ears despite excessive sweating and they are loud enough to block out any noise. Nice quick charge time and usually last 3 or 4 gym sessions. Good customer service from Bose too 😉.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H

customer_reviews.title: Highly oversized looking - stick way out!
customer_reviews.text: Sound a little better than previous wired model. Functions work with iPhone. Sweat proof is good One thing however- the ear buds are massive! They stick way out of your ears and in this regard look oversized and truth be told a little ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second pair - not working again!
customer_reviews.text: I'm now on my second pair of Bose SoundSport headphones after returning the first pair. And my second pair have packed up!!! I brought these because I was sick of cheap headphones breaking, my old £20 ones lasted longer. Very disappointed. I'm going to return these and look for alternative ones. It's a shame because the headphones are very nice, it's just I've had two pairs and both stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Don't buy these headphones

customer_reviews.title: Top quality sound spectrum..
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and the other half won't stop thanking me for them. He listens to mostly dnb and jungle so wanted good sound spectrum and these have them. Sound clarity is on point but wouldn't expect less from Bose. Delivery was on the slow side but forgivable as it was Xmas. If your into your music these are the ones. Battery life is about 6hrs but what it lacks in battery life makes up for in quality. They don't slip out of the ears and the clip to attach to the t-shirt on the back is just what's needed for security.
customer_reviews.author: Netti

customer_reviews.title: What you expect from Bose
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper pair of Bluetooth headphones for sport. They were good but they only lasted 5 months before the battery gave up completely. These are fantastic, you get what you pay for. Battery life is great and you can pair it to the Bose app for firmware upgrades and battery status. When you switch the headphones on you're notified of battery status. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding ogre ears
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say they cancel noise more than my other headphones which are no where near as expensive as these. I can still hear plenty when I've got them in. They fit comfortably though and most importantly don't fall out when I'm running, which is what I was after. I wasn't expecting them to stick so far out my ears, so I look slightly odd from the front. Kind of like I've got ogre ears but we can all look odd running and working out so depends if that matters to you
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but...
customer_reviews.text: Really good product and exactly what I need, however had to return this as the ear bud itself is massive. It’s super heavy and really feels so different to the old wired ear buds Bose makes. Still some work needs doing to reduce the size
customer_reviews.author: Sam Styles

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after sending back a set of BeatsX wireless as didn’t find them comfortable for long periods and fell out while running. In contrast these are very comfortable and can wear for hours. They also don’t fall out while running. Sound quality is excellent and great bass (I mainly listen to hip-hop, r&b). Only downside I would say is the cable can grip the skin on the back of your neck when running, although you can use the clip to clip on to t-shirt which helps. Also battery life could be better but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: bowpeep

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery life
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, microphone is good and sound is good. BUT after only 3-4 months the battery life tailed off very markedly. then started searching for issues with battery life and there are lots of them reported online. In fairness Bose offered a replacement but only after I had shipped the old pair back meaning I'd be without them for 14 days - not great when they are needed for work every day. I'm also worried that the replacement pair will be no better in 3-4 months time
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It breaks me heart to write this review as I LOVE Bose but these earphones are useless. They keep disconnecting unless In CONSTANT use and the volume level is appalling - only works well in a silent room, any noise around you and you simply cannot hear
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: The only Bose headphone that ever disappointed me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a great fan of Bose products. But this one was: - uncomfortable; none of the ear pieces fit me. eventually, my earlobes began to hurt - unrealiable; kept dropping connections. battery died very quickly. battery drained slowly overnight Returned.
customer_reviews.author: K N

customer_reviews.title: Great product, comfy to wear and fit securley
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fantastic once you fit the correct size ear buds that are supplied. Very comfy to wear and stay securley in you ears. They charge very quickly too. The bass is great and the treble is very clear. In fact the sound is almost as good as my main full sized BOSE headphones
customer_reviews.author: C Lelliott

customer_reviews.title: An excellent piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: An excellent piece of kit. I use them with a Sony NW-A35 Walkman AND they are just terrific. My musical tastes are predominantly classical although jazz features too. I have book readings on it for long-haul flying.
customer_reviews.author: Motte 1

customer_reviews.title: Good until 2 years in
customer_reviews.text: Wrecked after just under 2 years. Only turns on half the time and sometimes turns itself off. The sound is quality though and they where good while they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: TechExpert

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose at all
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as sports headphones these cumbersome heavy set fall out with the slightest movement or limited sweating, both typically experienced when exercising. I’m sure they’re engineered to deliver excellent sound quality but you wouldn’t know and you only enjoy that fit briefly when refitting...constantly. Awful, don’t bother, find something that actually stays in your ear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad.
customer_reviews.text: Battery is really bad in this product, it's only charging to 90% and then dies completely after 1 hour. The sound is perfect, but the earphones are very flimsy,which shouldnt happen for this price. After a year small parts started to fall off. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kasia

customer_reviews.title: Bose support what a joke
customer_reviews.text: So now on my third pair as both previous went faulty... the sound is amazing and stay hear really does what it says. I’ll never buy another Bose item online amazon service is great, but the Bose support is shocking and they expect you to wait 5 weeks while you send that pair to them so they can send a pair back I’ll always go to a Bose shop now as they told me they price match and they were decent enough to swap me there and then also it’s impossible at Bose to get someone you can understand or they can’t interpret the info your giving them.
customer_reviews.author: Reading club

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones - really good sound
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones - really good sound, the Bluetooth has fantastic range and are great for the gym. They stay I my ears and are light and comfortable -
customer_reviews.author: A. Dow

product_meta.title: Bose SoundSport Wireless Headphones - Blue
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Aqua BlueWith no wires in the way, Bose SoundSport wireless headphones keep you moving with powerful audio and Stay Hear+ tips designed for comfort and stability. A soft silicone material and unique shape provide a secure fit that stays put and feels good. Connect to your device easily with Bluetooth and NFC pairing and use the inline mic and remote to control volume, skip tracks and take calls. With the Bose Connect app, controlling and switching between multiple devices is easy. These headphones are sweat and weather resistant and have a lithium-ion battery that delivers up to 6 hours per charge. With performance like this, the only challenge left is your workout. Included: Sound Sport wireless headphones; Stay Hear+ tips; USB charging cable; carry case. SoundSport wireless headphones have a range of 30 feet (9 meters) from the source device.

BOX CONTAINS
SoundSport wireless headphones, StayHear+ tips, USB charging cable, Carry case
feature_bullets: Bose active EQ provides balanced audio at any volume
Wireless convenience, with easy Bluetooth and NFC pairing aided by voice prompts
Exclusive Stay Hear+ tips keep the headphones comfortably in place during workouts
Sweat and weather resistance for reliability while exercising. Charging time: 2 hours
Up to 6 hours battery life per charge; please refer the User Guide before use

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
